comments.body:
Looks like you're missing the:

```
build:
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
    number: 0
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@  url: https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/P/Pint/Pint-{{version}}.zip
  md5: 88aa0918019071546b10c5fbdc91ae5e

build:
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
